message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn to decide!
Meet me in the middle, Alice!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time, Bob. Your turn to decide!
You're being too stingy, Alice! I'm taking a bigger cut this time!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet somewhere in the middle again!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking the majority this time!
I'm trying to be more generous, Bob. Let's find a fair split!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking most of the remaining cash!
Last chance, Bob. Let's split it down the middle for the final time!
